triples.name: Control system
triples.relevance: The paper focuses on safety-critical control systems and their complex behavior that requires runtime assurance approaches.

triples.name: Cyber-physical system
triples.relevance: Safety filtering approaches are applied to cyberphysical systems that integrate physical and computational components.

triples.name: Automatic Ground Collision Avoidance System
triples.relevance: Auto GCAS is presented as a concrete implementation and exemplar of runtime assurance systems for safety-critical aviation control.

triples.name: Safety engineering
triples.relevance: Runtime assurance techniques are grounded in safety engineering principles for ensuring acceptable safety levels in critical systems.

triples.name: Autonomous system
triples.relevance: The paper discusses safety filtering approaches relevant to autonomy community seeking to assure safety in complex intelligent control systems.
